Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Status hearing on December 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.
NOH sent to Def at Barron Co Jail

11:26 AM Defendant Devon S Bernstein appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Devon S Bernstein.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
COVERS 22CF199, 22CF201, 22CF244 & 22CF245

22CF199 & 22CF201- Reading of Information waived. 
NG pleas entered to each count in both cases.  
Bond to continue. 

22CF244 & 22CF245-Attorney Erdman relates and waives further reading.
DE to contact PD office to have Attorney Erdman appointed on this case.
Attorney Erdman waives time limits for preliminary hearing. 
Preliminary hearing 11/17/22 3:30 pm before Judge Bitney 
Court orders $2500.00 Signature bond in each case with condition of Must not possess any firearms.
Status hearing scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.

4:11 PM Defendant Devon S Bernstein appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Devon S Bernstein.  Attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for State of Wisconsin. 

4:11 PM Officer Mackenzie Strohm, patrol officer with Cumberland PD, called, sworn and direct by State.
4:25 PM Cross by Attorney Erdman.
4:26 PM Re-direct by State.
4:26 PM Re-cross by Attorney Erdman.
4:27 PM Court questions witness.

Court finds probable cause and binds over.
Bail to continue.
Arraignment scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 11:15 am.

Preliminary hearing on October 6, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
NOH sent to Def at Barron Co Jail

10:07 AM Defendant Devon S Bernstein appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Erdman appears by video. Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. This covers cases 22CF201, 22CF199, & 22CF220.  Attorney Erdman relates she will take both cases.  Attorney Steuer relates DE requests waiver of extradition in 22CF220.  All hearings set to 1:00 PM today.  Court requests jail to bring DE up in person for hearings today.
Hearing scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:49 PM Defendant Devon S Bernstein in court, in custody.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Devon S Bernstein.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS CASES 22CF220, 22CF199 AND 22CF201

(Clerked by AP)
1:50  Court relates and gives appearances. Next hearing set before Judge Bitney in 22CF199 and 22CF201 - preliminary hearing 10/06/22 at 3:45 PM for 1/2 hr. (DE waives time limits).  Bonds to continue.

22CF220: Court questions defendant and Atty. Erdman.  Defendant indicates he wishes to waive extradition to Minnesota; Court accepts waiver.  Defendant has signed waiver of extradition; Court signs same. 

(MS scanned to jail)
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

1:02PM Defendant Devon S Bernstein appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Adrian W Longacre appeared by video for Devon S Bernstein, for today.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

COVERS 22CF199 & 22CF201

Defense requests bond modification in 22CF201.
1:03 PM Parties in a breakout room.
1:05 PM Parties back from breakout room
Attorney Longacre requests bond be reduce to $1,000.00 cash.
State relates and objects.
Court denies bond modification.

10:18 AM Defendant Devon S Bernstein appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS CASES 22CF199 AND 22CF201

10:19  Court relates and gives appearances.  Defendant has qualified for Public Defender services, but counsel has not yet been appointed.
Court resets both above before Judge Boyle.
Bonds to continue.

(MS scanned to jail)
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

1:16 PM Defendant Devon S Bernstein appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Devon S Bernstein for today only.  Address confirmed and has NO PHONE.  Attorney Rockow relates.  Court sets signature bond.
